participant_1.background:
I'm a solitary type and my favorite animal is the cat.
i like watching ufc fights.
i barely show up to work.
I value my memories with my cat more than anything in the world.
My kids are my first priority, so I wake up early to make sure I have time to drive them to their sports events.

participant_2.background:
I usually wear comfortable clothes when I visit India because I am there to relax.
I'm not a big exerciser because I get anxious when I push myself too hard.
i enjoy making 3d models for video games and animations.
I enjoy movies that are full of suspense and mystery.
i recently had knee surgery.

content.text: Hi, how's it going?
Hey! It's going well! I am about to head out for some shopping. What are you up to?
I am about to take a nap. I have to drive my kids to their sports events later.
Oh, I see! I hope your kids have a great time at their sports events!
Thanks! I hope so too. Do you have any kids?
No, I don't have any kids. I'm still young and I want to focus on my career for now.
That's great! I hope you have a long and successful career.
Thank you! I hope so too! What do you do for work?
I'm a lawyer. I work for a small firm.
Oh, that's cool! I've always been interested in law.
It's a lot of work, but it can be very rewarding.
I'm sure it is! Do you like it?
I do, for the most part. It can be stressful, but it's also very interesting.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thank you! I am. What do you do for fun?
I like to make 3D models for video games and animations.
That's cool! I've never been very good at art.
It's not too hard to learn! There are a lot of great tutorials online.
I might have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a great day!
You too!
